pages.text: Various tools can be crafted from $(l:ae2:world_gen/certus_quartz_crystals)Certus Quartz Crystals$(/l).$(br2)With the exception of the $(item)Certus Quartz Wrench$() and $(item)Certus Quartz Cutting Knife$() all tools behave like other minecraft tools.$(br2)All tools have a the hardness and durability of iron tools.
A wrench made from $(l:ae2:world_gen/certus_quartz_crystals)Certus Quartz Crystals$(/l).$(br2)Used to rotate or instantaneously break ME blocks and remove parts and facades from cables.

pages.title: Cutting Knife
pages.text: A cutting knife made out of $(l:ae2:world_gen/certus_quartz_crystals)Certus Quartz Crystals$(/l).$(br)Used to make Inscriber Name Press, Cable Anchor, and Cable Facade.
